title: Why two Pixels 2 XL are treated differently?
content:
I have two Pixel 2 XL phones. When I read that Google is offering the last monthly update for the 2 XL I rushed to update.

My first phone updated right away, but on the second phone I get the message:

"Regular updates have ended for this device" and I don't seem to be able to update.

Why is this happening?

Anyone else had this problem?

Any solution?

Thank you,

Reuven
